content.question: Using the excerpts, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly explain ONE major difference between Gaddis’ and Westad’s historical interpretations of the Cold War. Briefly explain how ONE event or development in the period 1945 to 1980 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Gaddis’ interpretation. Briefly explain how ONE event or development in the period 1945 to 1980 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Westad’s interpretation.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
